body.name: Handheld Game Console for Kids Adults, Game Boy Portable Retro Game Console with 500 Classic Arcade Video Games 3 Inch Color Screen, 1020mAh Rechargeable Support TV Connection & Two Players(red)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: 🏆[Built-in 500 Classic Games]: Niaycouky's handheld game console has 500 built-in classic games, like action, sports, racing, shooting, fighting arcade games and etc, no card to download, no extra cost. It bringing funny game time to children/adult, but also waking up the wonderful childhood memories of adults as well as releasing their life pressure.

🏆[With Special Customized Game Box]: It‘s a nice gift choice with a retro game console box to ensure the safety of the slim retro video games device. Compact and lightweight handheld game console, mini body, carry it with you. On the way to work, free time, the best choice for a relaxing mood.

🏆[1 Hours Charger & 8 Hours Play]: Built-in 1020mAh high capacity lithium battery, Niaycouky's handheld mini-game console comes with a USB cable, charging time is about 1~3 hours, 5~8 hours of continuous gameplay. When you are on a business trip, traveling, camping, you don't have to worry about running out of power.

🏆[Support 2 Player & Play on TV]: A gamepad is included in the package to connect to the little handheld game console for two-player games. You can also connect to the TV and transfer the game to the TV for a better gaming experience.

🏆[Perfect gift for kids & adult]: This handheld game console for kids is the perfect gift choice for Birthday Christmas and New year festival moments, It is also a great gift to remind adult child memory, its a nice gift this year.
💕[Buy 1 Use Five Years]: 5 year warranty from date of purchase of Niaycouky Handheld Game Console. 24 hours online anytime, In case of any defective product, we will respond immediately.
body.description: NOTE Please read the instructions carefully before use This game console does not have the function of saving the progress of the game. When you quit the game, all progress will be zero Do not dispose of batteries in fire Do not short circuit battery contacts Remove the battery from the unit if it will not be used for an extended period of time

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Return to the fun and nostalgia of the 80's Built-in 500 classic games - 80s 90s retro games meet your demand to play varieties of games that you like.Great Gift - Elegant and stylish design, the GameBoy is a gift that can create happiness and memories for game lovers.High-resolution screen - Adapted AV cable to connect the console to your TV and makes you enjoy playing games on the big screen.Convenient for Carrying - Compact size and lightweight. You can easily put it in your bag or pocket.After-sales service - 12-month commitment, If there is any quality problem with the product, we will send a replacement. NOTE: The product accessories are small and easy to lose during packaging. If your box is missing cables or battery, please let us know and we will send a replacement.

Super High-Cost Performance Easy to connect the game console with TV( An additional longer 3m AV cable is included), enjoy the larger screen gaming experience. Portable and Elegant Compact and lightweight handheld game console, mini case, take away. The best choice for a relaxed atmosphere in airplanes, camps, traveling, or on the way to work 500-in-1 Super Classic games Built-in 500 Retro FC games, the best choice for a relaxed mood. Bring you and your children back to the fun of your childhood. A great gift for the whole family

Include: Retro game console * 1External controller * 1AV Cable * 1Addtional 3m AV Cable*1USB Charging Cable * 1User manual * 1 NOTE Please read the instructions carefully before use This game console does not have the function of saving the progress of the game. When you quit the game, all progress will be zero Do not dispose of batteries in fire Do not short circuit battery contacts Remove the battery from the unit if it will not be used for an extended period of time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Inexpensive Toy for Hours of Entertainment
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the handheld GameBoy and couldn't be happier with my decision. This little device is a nostalgia trip like no other, it has so many games on it from the 80s and 90s! Mario is timeless and keeps my family entertained for hours!This device is compact and size and great for travel or long car rides! I love being able to take it with me everywhere! Plus, the included AV cable allows me to connect the GameBoy to my TV for even more fun with friends and family. It is an awesome inexpensive device that packs a big punch with so many games.The handheld GameBoy is a fantastic purchase and would make an excellent gift for any kid or adult! I plan on purchasing a second because we play it so often and intend to buy many more for gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this game device for one of our children and there are a good handful of games that do not work. I will not be sending it back due to the hassle. Out of 500 games several that I played in my childhood do not work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of Games and rechargable, I highly recommend.
reviews.reviewText: I bought 10 of these for a children's charity, I went through them to make sure they all worked, they did.I fully charged all of them so the kids had a toy they could play with when they open them.I played a few of the games and they were spot on, just like the arcade and their original hand held versions.I Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars After using for a short time a line appeared on device. Is this normal or will they replace?
reviews.reviewText: They love the game but I am not happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Consola muy buena y divertida. Mi sobrino feliz con su regalo, tiene muchos juegos incluidos y lo mejor es que puedes conectar al televisor y usar ambos mandos de controles para que puedan jugar 2 al mismo tiempo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and fun to play - this little handheld takes me back to being a kid!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and cheap
reviews.reviewText: Remember this is only $20. It’s great for what you pay for. It’s fun and entertaining. Perfect for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought it as a gift for my boyfriend, and although it's not the most expensive, it's exactly what I was looking for. It works well, has classic games like all the Mario Bros worlds, comes with its controller and cable to connect to the TV if you want. The games sound pretty loud, but you can mute them, and the battery also lasts a long time
